benchmark_details.name: CLAMBER (Clarifying Ambiguous Queries)
benchmark_details.overview: CLAMBER presents a benchmark for evaluating LLMs in identifying and clarifying ambiguous user queries through a well-organized taxonomy, providing âˆ¼12K high-quality data.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMs in identifying and clarifying ambiguous queries to enhance user trust and information retrieval.

data.source: Constructed from various datasets including ALCUNA, AmbiTask, AmbER, AmbiPun, AmbiCoref, AmbigQA, and Dolly.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of LLMs in identifying ambiguities and generating clarifying questions.
methodology.interpretation: High Accuracy and F1 Score indicate effective performance in handling ambiguity.
methodology.baseline_results: Results include evaluations against various LLMs including ChatGPT, Llama2, and Vicuna.
methodology.validation: Dataset validation involved five linguistic experts reviewing the ambiguity labels and clarifying questions.
